channel.title: Projects on Arnav Saxena
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Arnav Saxena

item.title: Game theoretic approach for Word Sense Disambiguation
item.description: Implemented a novel word sense disambiguation model incorporating evolutionary game theory based on the 2016 Association for Computational Linguistics paper by Rocco Tripodi and Marcello Pelillo. Gihub Link: Github@DefinitelyArnav/NLP

item.title: Satark Crime Mapper
item.description: Satark is a digital crime recording and analytics web application built for performing real time spatial data analysis on crime data to help the police personnels identify crime hotspots and prevailing crime trends. The application was conceived as a solution to the problem statement of crime mapping offered by the Govt of Assam during the Smart India Hackathon â€™18. It composed of three major components A database management system for recording geospatial crime data built using postgreSQL.
